reviews.name: Liza B
reviews.comment: I would highly recommend Dr. Bigava clinic, from very beginning Dr.Bigava answered all my questions via email and managed to make an appointment for me when I am on holiday in Croatia. My dentist in Glasgow tried to extract the tooth but failed, because the molar cracked and I was left literally with only two infected roots. I was told that I would need a surgical extraction and was put on a long waiting list. However, when I arrived to Dr. Bigava clinic, Marco assured me that I might not need a surgical procedure and he extracted both roots within 15 min, no cuts, no stitches, true professional. And now it is the third day after my extraction, I have minimal pain, minimal swelling and feel absolutely great!

reviews.comment:
About a year ago I moved to Split and was looking for a clinic to proceed with my ongoing orthodontic treatment. My case was somewhat unusual, by that time I had missed several scheduled appointments with my regular doctor already, and Dr. Susana was the only one in the city who agreed to take me in.
She examined my current situation and presented me with a treatment plan, which included correction of the mistakes made by my previous doctor. Everything went smoothly, she would always answer all of my questions and keep me updated on the progress.
During the treatment I also required replacement of existing fillings, that was when Marko stepped in and done the perfect job.
Tina and Jelena were always there for me as well to help with everything from assistance during appointments to managing my visits.
I have always felt that people in this clinic love what they do, being true professionals, they deeply care about the comfort and health of the patients.
A year flew by, I am now a happy owner of a perfect smile full of healthy teeth (you can check it out for yourself on their Instagram).
As for the clinic itself, it's very clean, well-kept and packed with modern equipment.
Look no further.

reviews.name: Salva Aparicio
reviews.comment:
During my holidays in Croatia I needed to visit urgently a Dental Clinic due to acute pain in teeth.

Dr. Susan Bigava Marsic's dental clinic is truly exceptional. From the moment I walked through the door, I was greeted by a warm and friendly staff who made me feel comfortable and at ease.

The clinic itself is clean, modern, and well equipped, which immediately gave me confidence in the level of care I would receive.

They took the time to thoroughly explain each step of the dental procedure I needed, ensuring that I understood the process and felt comfortable throughout.

Their attention to detail and gentle approach made the entire experience virtually painless (Tooth extraction)

Easy communication in very good English.

I highly recommend Dental Clinic Dr. Susan Bigava Marsic.

reviews.name: Stephen Vukas
reviews.comment: My wife and I had exceptional experiences at Susan's office. Marko provided outstanding care, taking the time to address all our questions and making sure we had as pain-free experience as possible during our procedures. He skillfully identified and repaired an issue with my wife's tooth, a consequence of previous work done in the United States. The confidence in the quality of care led me to schedule additional work. The positive and light atmosphere in the office adds comfort to what is typically not a pleasurable experience. Highly recommend this dental practice!
